title: I developed a somewhat disturbing eating habit(for steak)

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
First off a little bit about what's been going on, lately I been kind of obsessed with western cuisine. Mainly cooking steak. Ive did many trials on different types of cut, and the time it takes to cook it. I found out I enjoy eating sirloin steak cooked **blue rare **the most.

http://i66.tinypic.com/30agkuh.jpg[/IMG]

In fact it makes me think of what my favorite Japanese restaurant feeds me, a dish called "Beef Tataki"

http://i64.tinypic.com/2qlu1jk.png[/IMG]

http://i67.tinypic.com/wt6jhc.jpg[/IMG]

http://i65.tinypic.com/2a9wu10.jpg[/IMG]
